segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely oblivious to the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of sadness watching her stand in the water, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking cookies from the jar, their faces filled with joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness, remembering my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see the children's happiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep sense of melancholy watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
